name: Sir Broderick - Demo
description:
A dark power is pouring into the kingdoms.

A small 2D pixel platformer in which you slip into the skin of "Sir Broderick". A heroic knight who helps kings free the castles from the dark power.

  • 2D Platformer with Puzzle elements
  • Improve your skill to set a new high score
  • Controller/Keyboard support
Demo

The small game is currently only a demo, which includes only one level. I'm not sure if and when this project will be continued, but I still didn't want to withhold it from you.

My current fastest run is 3m32s, try to beat that.

Credits

Tileset/Character - https://maxence-jacquot.itch.io/tiny-tower-16x16-asset-pack

GUI - https://dan-velasquez-art.itch.io/gui-pack-bars-n-boxes

Sound - https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack
